item.title: Health hazard and fly and disease hazard, 16th June
item.description:
There is a fly and disease hazard from these foreign residents who don't care about their neighbours. This is just too much!, too much! 160 Slade Green road. Perhaps a leaflet would help them? Squash this now, before something happens. This must be stopped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slade Green Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are numerous potholes in the drive/entrance to the Manor House (Sidcup Registry Office) and entrance to Holmbury Manor., 16th June
item.description:
These potholes are dangerous and hazardous both to pedestrians and cars and especially people in wheelchairs. This has been ongoing for months and the potholes are just getting worse and worse. Repairs need to be carried out asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Green, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 40 Leighton Road, 16th June
item.description:
